description: Deletes all versions of the intent, including the $LATEST version. To delete a specific version of the intent, use the  DeleteIntentVersion operation. You can delete a version of an intent only if it is not referenced. To delete an intent that is referred to in one or more bots (see  how-it-works), you must remove those references first. This operation requires permission for the lex:DeleteIntent action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the intent. The name is case sensitive.
